data.text:
Discover the contact details for Indian actor Kamal Haasan, including his house address, phone number, email ID, and other contact information. Additionally, you can find details about Kamal Haasan’s management office, such as the address and phone number for his manager, secretary, or booking agent, as well as his WhatsApp contact. If you are interested in learning more about Kamal Haasan, including his biography, family, career, marriage, education, height, and more, you can find all the relevant information here.

If you’re curious about Kamal Haasan and looking for ways to contact him or find his phone number, email ID, or residence address, as well as information on his presence on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram, this article provides the available answers to such queries.

Kamal Haasan House Address, Email Id, Phone Number

House Address: 218, TTK Road, Alwarpet Chennai 600018, Tamil Nadu, India

Phone Number: +91-7772853906

Email Id: [email protected]

WhatsApp Number: +91-7772853906

Hometown: Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India

Residence: Chennai, India

Office Address: Not Available

Booking Agent Phone Number: Not Available

Manager Phone Number: Not Available

Management Email Id: Not Available

Fan Mail Address: Not Available

Kamal Haasan Social Media Profiles

Instagram Handle: https://www.instagram.com/ikamalhaasan/

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/iKamalHaasan

Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/ikamalhaasan

Kamal Haasan Biography: Early Life, Career And Personal Life

Kamal Haasan, born on November 7, 1954, in Ramanathapuram, Madras State, India, is a versatile figure in the Indian entertainment industry. He is recognized as an accomplished film actor, director, producer, screenwriter, playback singer, and lyricist, predominantly working in Tamil movies. Kamal Haasan is highly popular and one of the highest-paid actors, with an estimated net worth of around $100 million and a salary of Rs. 30 crores per film. He has received numerous awards and nominations, including three National Film Awards and nineteen Filmfare awards for Best Actor.

Starting his on-screen journey as a child artist in “Kalathur Kannamma” (1959), Kamal Haasan made his lead role debut in “Arangetram” (1973). His notable box office successes include films like “Nayagan,” “Vigilante Film Indian,” “Hey Ram,” “Virumaandi,” “Vishwaroopam,” and “Dasavathaaram.” Kamal Haasan was honored with the Kalaimamani award in 1979, Padma Shri, Padma Bhushan, and Orde Des Arts et des Lettres in 2016.

Born in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India, Kamal Haasan is the son of D. Srinivasan, a lawyer, and Rajalakshmi Srinivasan. He has two brothers, Chandrahasan and Charuhasan, and one sister, Nalini Raghu. Kamal Haasan was previously married to Vani Ganapathy in 1978 but got divorced in 1988. Later, he married actress Sarika Thakur in 1988, but they divorced in 2004. Kamal Haasan is the father of three daughters, Shruti Haasan (actress), Akshara Haasan (actress), and Subbalakshmi. His religious affiliation is Hindu, sun sign is Scorpio, and he holds Indian nationality.

Standing at a height of 5 ft 7 in (170 cm) and weighing 76 kg (167 pounds), Kamal Haasan’s body measurements are 40-34-14 inches. His chest size is 40 inches, waist size is 34 inches, and biceps size is 14 inches. He has black hair and black eyes.
